query:
query GetAFGReportData($organizationId: String!, $teacherId: String!, $isGroupSelected: Boolean, $studentIds: [String!], $subject: Float!, $groupIds: [String!], $assignmentIds: [String!], $orderBy: String, $datesAtRisk: Float, $hierarchy: String) {
  getAFGReportData(
    filterParams: {subject: $subject, isGroupSelected: $isGroupSelected, studentIds: $studentIds, groupIds: $groupIds, assignmentIds: $assignmentIds, orderBy: $orderBy, datesAtRisk: $datesAtRisk, hierarchy: $hierarchy}
    userId: $teacherId
    organizationId: $organizationId
  ) {
    reportRun
    assignmentRow {
      organizationName
      teacherTitle
      teacherFirstName
      teacherLastName
      teacherName
      teacherUsername
      teacherID
      gradeDisplayOrder
      assignmentTitle
      assignmentID
      strandSkillRows {
        strandName
        strandLevel
        catalogNum
        objectiveID
        loDescription
        lessonNumber
        lessonTitle
        targetedLessonLink
        studentRows {
          username
          studentName
          studentFirstName
          studentLastName
          studentId
          personID
          failedDate
          grade
          group {
            groupId
            groupName
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
